movie.title: You're Invited: The Making of Night of the Demons
movie.title_english: You're Invited: The Making of Night of the Demons
movie.title_long: You're Invited: The Making of Night of the Demons (2014)
movie.description_intro: Retrospective documentary on the making of the low-budget horror cult favorite Night of the Demons (1988).
movie.description_full: Retrospective documentary on the making of the low-budget horror cult favorite Night of the Demons (1988).

movies.title: Iceberg Slim: Portrait of a Pimp
movies.title_english: Iceberg Slim: Portrait of a Pimp
movies.title_long: Iceberg Slim: Portrait of a Pimp (2012)
movies.summary: Examines the tumultuous life of legendary Chicago pimp Iceberg Slim (1918-1992) and how he reinvented himself from pimp to author of 7 groundbreaking books. These books were the birth of Street Lit and explored the world of the ghetto in gritty and poetic detail and have made him a cultural icon. Interviews with Iceberg Slim, Chris Rock, Henry Rollins, Ice-T, Snoop Dogg, and Quincy Jones.
movies.description_full: Examines the tumultuous life of legendary Chicago pimp Iceberg Slim (1918-1992) and how he reinvented himself from pimp to author of 7 groundbreaking books. These books were the birth of Street Lit and explored the world of the ghetto in gritty and poetic detail and have made him a cultural icon. Interviews with Iceberg Slim, Chris Rock, Henry Rollins, Ice-T, Snoop Dogg, and Quincy Jones.

movies.title: Banana in a Nutshell
movies.summary: An intimate portrait of a Chinese-European couple in New Zealand, and their journey to get a blessing for marriage from traditional Chinese parents.
movies.description_full: An intimate portrait of a Chinese-European couple in New Zealand, and their journey to get a blessing for marriage from traditional Chinese parents.
movies.synopsis: An intimate portrait of a Chinese-European couple in New Zealand, and their journey to get a blessing for marriage from traditional Chinese parents.

movies.title: Take the Ball Pass the Ball: The Making of the Greatest Team in the World
movies.title_english: Take the Ball Pass the Ball: The Making of the Greatest Team in the World
movies.title_long: Take the Ball Pass the Ball: The Making of the Greatest Team in the World (2018)
movies.summary: Take the Ball, Pass the Ball is the definitive story of the greatest football team ever assembled. For four explosive years Pep Guardiola's Barça produced the greatest football in history, seducing fans around the world. In this exclusive, first-hand account of events between 2008 and 2012, the players themselves reveal the tension of the bitter Guardiola-Mourinho rivalry, the emotion of Abidal's fight back from cancer to lift the European Cup and how Messi, the best footballer the world's ever seen, was almost rejected by Barça as a 13-year-old.
